definition: lit. spirit and marrow/the essential character
medulla oblongata (the lower half of the brainstem)
myelin sheath (membrane surrounding axon of nerve cell)
lit. penetrate to the marrow (idiom); deeply affected/moved to the core

sentences.english: Epidural migration of a sequestrated disc to posterior epidural space is rare.
sentences.chinese: 遊離的髓核移位至後方硬膜外間隙是非常少見的。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the accuracy of imaging diagnosis of intrathoracic tumor-simulating extramedullary hematopoiesis(EMH).
sentences.chinese: 目的提高對胸內瘤樣髓外造血組織影像診斷的準確性。

sentences.english: There is no decussation in the lateral corticospinal tract after the decussation at the medullary pyramids.
sentences.chinese: 它們在髓狀錐體交叉後，不會在皮層脊髓側束中交叉。

sentences.english: Subsequent imaging studies demonstrated the presence of the rongeur tip in the left ventricle.
sentences.chinese: 隨後的影像學檢查證實髓核鉗尖端在左心室內。

sentences.english: At high power, the bone marrow of a patient with acute myelogenous leukemia is seen here.
sentences.chinese: 在高倍鏡下，見到的是急性髓母細胞白血病骨髓。

sentences.english: The myelin has a netlike appearance in such preparations.
sentences.chinese: 髓磷脂在此標本中呈網狀外觀。

sentences.english: Birth later period, cauline stalk lignification, and the pith ministry inside the bine is formed hollow.
sentences.chinese: 生育後期，莖稈木質化，而莖內的髓部則形成空心。

sentences.english: Methods Clinical data of 34 cases with medulloblastomas were retrospectively analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 方法對34例兒童髓母細胞瘤的臨牀資料進行分析。

sentences.english: The first is the blood cell-forming organ. This is the site where myelogenous leukemia begins.
sentences.chinese: 它首先是血細胞形成器官，髓細胞白血病即從此發源。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the operation for spinal seeding of medulloblastoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價髓母細胞瘤脊髓種植的手術治療意義。

sentences.english: Meningiomas are the second most common intradural-extramedullary spinal tumor and are more common in women.
sentences.chinese: 脊膜瘤是第二常見的髓外硬膜下腫瘤，更常見於女性。

sentences.english: In the middle of stem is the pith, which composed of abundant parenchymatous cells with rhombohedral crystals.
sentences.chinese: 莖中央是大型薄壁細胞構成的髓，具簇晶。

sentences.english: This drug can replenish vital essence, tonify kidney-yin and nourish the Bone marrow so it is effective against gynecological diseases.
sentences.chinese: 本藥品補腎滋陰，填精益髓，是醫治女性疾病的良藥。

sentences.english: Methods 12 cases with medulloblastoma were conformed by surgery and pathology.
sentences.chinese: 方法收集經手術與病理證實的髓母細胞瘤12例。

sentences.english: In lower thoracic and lumbar regions posterior medullary arteries present typical "hair - pin" curve.
sentences.chinese: 胸下部及腰部後髓動脈呈典型“髮卡”樣折曲。

definition: soul/mortal soul, i.e. attached to the body
to nibble away at sth/to eat into/to erode
variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
